body: Hi  I added the HB_setEPZone Thresholds component into the canvas. But I am still confused about the same result I got regarding using different cooling set points. See as below: [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/0k1PGPsOMFKwJxVJaVdBuxJ1jZoJKtL0E52SA9TrZvVNTzMnu19l2jPDVi5MEDG-ba5ddlaLIJcepHtBrgK8u-hEDYcR*C8K/Results.jpg) I have also attached the modified example file which I add 'HB_setEPZoneThresholds' component into 'Apply Properties for an Energy Simulation' part. Can anyone kindly give me a brief explain? Very appreciate in advance!
topic: Abnormal result for indoor micro-climate map result2
